about_the_game:
TimeTrecker is a 2D top-view shooter game.
Players engage in constant combat to achieve achievements, activate abilities, and unlock heroes, weapons, and plug-ins.
Each hero's skills and attributes are different, customize with different combinations of weapons and plug-ins, and play your own combat genre.

This work is inspired by "Crimsonland", "Vampire Survivor" and "Into the Breach". I hope you like it.

Introduction to worldview:
After the "mass extinction", the earth is covered in black fog, and the humans who fled the earth have launched the "TimeTrecker" project,
sending elites through the "time and space wormhole" to return to the past to prevent the catastrophe from happening,
the characters you operate need to turn the tide of the war, rewrite the timeline, and save the world before the "mass extinction" happens.

Main features:
■ Featured heroes: Unlock different heroes, a variety of hero skills, so that each play has a different experience
■ Custom weapons: A variety of weapons and plug-ins for you to combine at will, you can match your favorite weapon system to save the world
■ Random branch missions: Explore, annihilate, survive, defend and other branch missions, each time is a new challenge.
■ One more round: Rich achievement points waiting for you to unlock, achievement points can strengthen the hero in the main base, simplify the difficulty of the game, let you fight more brave in the game.









If you are interested in games, you can download the trial version to play first

The demo includes:
■ You can choose a hero to complete a battle zone, including boss level and hidden level.
■ Levels include random branch missions, map support pods.
■ Boosts attributes for characters.
■ Includes all weapons, plugins, items and stat boosts and other random content.
■ You can obtain some in-game achievement points and activate some additional abilities.

Note: The demo savedata cannot be used for the official version!

If you think it is fun, please add to wishlist, your support is our continuous development motivation.

Future official releases will include:
■ Endless mode, unlimited combat.
■ 6 playable heroes and their own skills.
■ Complete drama theater flow, and more random maps.
■ More different monsters, different bosses.
■ More new weapons, plugins, items and other random content.
■ Earn all achievement points to activate more abilities and make fighting easier.

Welcome to join the QQ group for discussion
Stay tuned.

name: Time Treker Demo
short_description: TimeTreker is a 2D top-view shooter game. Players engage in constant combat to achieve achievements, activate abilities, and unlock heroes, weapons, and plug-ins. Customize with different combinations of weapons and plug-ins, and play your own combat genre.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
